dmca.title: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 37812]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing
Activity - MS Ref. 37812
Date: Tue, 9 Aug 2005 17:58:47 +0100
From: MSAntiPiracy02 <Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>,        <copyright@theplanet.com>

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

URL: http://www.notchill.com/
CASE #: 37812

09 August 2005

Dear Sir or Madam,

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
appears to be redirected on servers under your control, is offering
unlicensed copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities
relating to copyrighted computer programs published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works:

Computer program(s):
Windows XP Professional

Copyright owner:
Microsoft Corporation

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found via redirecting through
the following location(s): http://www.notchill.com/

The above location redirects to the site
http://www.litebay.org/software-1.html,
http://www.litebay.org/Windows%20XP%20PRO%20BR%20Corporate%20Edition%20com%2
0SP2%20(sem%20altera
